function EP03_23()
    --.転-5【9月第1週】「変わるモノ・変わらないモノ」
    SaveData.Title = "変わるモノ・変わらないモノ"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[That evening's dinner, Akira was unusually quiet.]])

    MSG([[Today's dish was "dipping pasta." Akira's favorite, she prepared a large plate piled with pasta and several small dishes of various dipping sauces.]])

    MSG([[There were three types of dipping sauces.]])

    MSG([[A carbonara-style sauce with plenty of fresh cream and cheese, a tomato-based Neapolitan sauce, and a refreshing Japanese-style sauce with shiso and ume shirasu.]])

    MSG([[Even though Akira had prepared all her favorites, there was no reaction, which made me sad.]])

    MSG([[Especially the Neapolitan sauce—a confident dish where I lightly simmered and fully flavored it so Akira could enjoy the bell peppers she usually dislikes... but...]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0393.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sadness・Loungewear "............"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0554.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Flustered・Casual wear "Glance... glance..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0394.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sadness・Loungewear "............"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0555.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Casual wear "Glance... glance..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0395.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "Um... It's hard to eat when you keep glancing like that."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0556.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Flustered・Casual wear "S-sorry. You just seemed a bit off."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0396.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "Nothing's different than usual. The food you make, Mina-chin, is always the best."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0397.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "Especially this tomato sauce. I can gobble up the bell peppers easily. You're practically the only one who can get me to eat this much bell pepper, Mina-chin."]])

    --//effect：フォント大
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0557.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling・Casual wear "Right, right!? It's delicious, isn't it!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0398.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Flustered・Loungewear "W-whoa, how much enthusiasm is that... Stop, it's surprising. Even the contents of a jack-in-the-box would jump out a little more modestly."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0558.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Casual wear "S-sorry, I was just happy."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0399.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sadness・Loungewear "Ah, no, I'm the one who should apologize for not thanking you for the meal. Even though you always make such wonderful dinners."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0400.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "In these past six months, I've gotten so used to this life, I've even forgotten to say thank you. That's what it means."]])

    MSG([[Akira said with a deep sense of reflection.]])

    MSG([[Now that I think about it, I have completely grown accustomed to living alone with Akira and maintaining a double life between the girls' and boys' divisions.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0559.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal・Casual wear "I see. It's been almost six months since we enrolled. Time really flies."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0560.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal・Loungewear "That also means the time limit I promised Mom is now less than six months away."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[At the end of next March, we'll have to make a final decision about Marika-nee's future.]])

    MSG([[No matter what, we have to find a lead before then.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0561.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal・Casual wear "If I win the next Princess Election, I plan to take a more active role."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0562.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious・Casual wear "If I can beat Uran-san, I should be able to hear more detailed stories about Marika-nee from the upperclassmen."]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0563.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious・Casual wear "This time for sure, I’ll get closer to the truth."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0401.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "That's right. If I, Erika Ikusa, defeat the current 'Princess' in the Princess Election, my position within the school will become rock-solid."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0402.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sadness・Loungewear "Even if I return to Papa and Mama, I should be able to conduct my investigations without any issues."]])
    --//SE：金属の落ちる音
PLAY_SE("SEb029.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[I accidentally dropped my fork on the table. I didn’t understand what Akira meant.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0564.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised・Casual wear "What do you mean? Returning to the guys?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0403.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear "...I’m joking. Just hypothetical."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0404.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "But Mina-chin has grown enough to handle cross-dressing on her own now."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0405.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "I shouldn't have to support you or give you cross-dressing training anymore. In fact, I think my presence might be a burden."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0406.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "So after the next Princess Election, I’m thinking I might return to my parents while leaving the house rented to you, Mina-chin."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0407.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "You’d just stay shut in here anyway."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0565.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Flustered・Casual wear "N-no way! That’s way too sudden!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0566.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious・Loungewear "The reason I’ve been able to keep going until now is because you’ve been by my side… And now you say that!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0567.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Loungewear "Don’t say things like that."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0408.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Surprised・Loungewear "Mina-chin."]])

    MSG([[Akira sighed deeply with a look of exasperation.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0409.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear "I told you, I’m joking. Mina-chin is totally hopeless without me."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0410.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Grinning・Loungewear "Your kind and cute cousin will always be there for you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0568.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Casual wear "...Really?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0411.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear "Maybe."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0569.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Casual wear "Please say it clearly."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0412.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Smiling・Loungewear "Well, well. First, we should focus on this month’s Princess Election. Let’s put this conversation aside for now."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0413.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Sadness・Loungewear "Because, honestly... I want to be by your side, Mina-chin."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0570.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised・Casual wear "Huh? What did you just say...?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0414.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Normal・Loungewear "Nothing. Please don’t mind it."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0571.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised・Casual wear "But you said you want to be by my side."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：頭を叩く音
PLAY_SE("SEc036.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0415.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "I said! Why won’t you just conveniently ignore that part!? Please learn the basics of romantic comedies!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0572.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sadness・Casual wear "Ouch!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0416.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】Serious・Loungewear "Now then, with timing in mind, this is the last cross-dressing training before the next Princess Election. Decide carefully which stats to improve."]])
    --//選択肢


    -- 　①ビジュアルの訓練
    -- 　②教養の訓練
    -- 　③精神の訓練

    local result = TrainingSelect()

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 選択肢分岐
    Training(result , "EP03_24")

end
